forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 43. Southeast wind 5 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: Rain before 7pm, then rain and snow between 7pm and 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 35, with temperatures rising to around 38 overnight. South wind 14 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: 6-inches of snow on Thursday and a complete powertilling of the upper loops to World Cup specs this morning. A touch soft today, but should be an amazing 7-10 day stretch starting tomorrow. Huge shoutout to Ben and the entire crew at Nubs for their commitment to Nordic skiing.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 7 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Upper Trails were power-tilled and tracked yesterday morning. The lower trails were packed yesterday. Conditions on the Upper Trails are very good.
nubsNob.comments: It feels like it's back to winter at Nub's Nob. The snow is in good shape this morning thanks to the new snow this week along with a late groom this morning. The wind is up today and the temperature should stay in the mid-20's. NASTAR Racing on Birch Run from 12:30 to 2:30 PM. The Tweed Tones will play the Nub's Pub this afternoon. Pintail Peak lodge is open with a deli and espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
